businessProfile.name: Cecil Whittaker's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 6018 S Grand Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63111, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 6018 S Grand Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63111, USA

reviews.text: I'll say this, it's an awesome place. I've never been disappointed with their food. Great deals also. I've been coming here for years. My waitress was extremely nice and attentive. Checked on us multiple times. Refilled our drinks and constantly asked how we were doing and if we needed anything. 10/10 would recommend üëå

10/10 first experience!! We got the pleasure of having Jerry take care of us today. He was attentive, caring and was on top of EVERYTHING!! The FOOD WAS AMAZING!!! For our first time in here I can‚Äôt talk highly enough about it!!!! Will be making this place a go to from now on!! Thank you!!

Grew up with Cecil's and it's always been my favorite place for pizza. I'm sure the staff works very hard, and they're nice people. Please go for this place if you're in South City and want pizza delivery; teir pizza flavor, no matter the toppings, is still my personal favorite.
I'll say this about my 3 star rating: the price of the food now is way too high for the style of food this place provides, and the dine in experience I had wasn't great.  I dined in with my partner and between the two of us our bill was a little over $50; we ordered a personal pepperoni pizza, a salad, one drink and an order of fried pickle chips. At the time, the place seemed understaffed, we had to seat ourselves, we didn't get refills on our drink, and the restaurant was honestly pretty dirty and had to approach the front counter and wait to receive and pay for our check. I understand that food prices are rising, but we dined in at a restaurant inthe Hill a week later for way better atmosphere, higher quality food, and enough staff to actually wait on us to get us refills and check on us for the same price. I'm sorry to the staff, and I'll still come back, but the Saint Charles locations seem to be in better shape and I'll still use this location for takeout or when their patio is open.

When a pizza place is so close and convenient you often forget to let others know how good it is!  We have been a patron since they opened and have NEVER had a bad experience!  Dine in, carry out or delivery, every time they pull through!  Perfect St. Louis style pizzas. Salads are also very good. Love their Zucchini sticks!  We are so spoiled and lucky to have this place in our neighborhood!

Terrible experience trying to order pizza over the phone. Called to place an order and was immediately put on hold. After 6 minutes, someone picked up and hung up on me. When I called back, I was put on hold again despite trying to explain the situation. I attempted to call multiple times, but my calls went unanswered. Unfortunately, it seems this pizza place is not interested in taking orders. Would not recommend.

editorial_summary.overview: Longtime local chain offering thin-crust, St. Louis-style pizza, plus sandwiches & sides like wings.

recentReviews.author: Matthew Thaxton
recentReviews.text: I'll say this, it's an awesome place. I've never been disappointed with their food. Great deals also. I've been coming here for years. My waitress was extremely nice and attentive. Checked on us multiple times. Refilled our drinks and constantly asked how we were doing and if we needed anything. 10/10 would recommend üëå

recentReviews.author: Anthony ‚ÄúT-Hawk‚Äù Militello
recentReviews.text:
Grew up with Cecil's and it's always been my favorite place for pizza. I'm sure the staff works very hard, and they're nice people. Please go for this place if you're in South City and want pizza delivery; teir pizza flavor, no matter the toppings, is still my personal favorite.
I'll say this about my 3 star rating: the price of the food now is way too high for the style of food this place provides, and the dine in experience I had wasn't great.  I dined in with my partner and between the two of us our bill was a little over $50; we ordered a personal pepperoni pizza, a salad, one drink and an order of fried pickle chips. At the time, the place seemed understaffed, we had to seat ourselves, we didn't get refills on our drink, and the restaurant was honestly pretty dirty and had to approach the front counter and wait to receive and pay for our check. I understand that food prices are rising, but we dined in at a restaurant inthe Hill a week later for way better atmosphere, higher quality food, and enough staff to actually wait on us to get us refills and check on us for the same price. I'm sorry to the staff, and I'll still come back, but the Saint Charles locations seem to be in better shape and I'll still use this location for takeout or when their patio is open.

recentReviews.author: Temeisha Brown
recentReviews.text: Terrible experience trying to order pizza over the phone. Called to place an order and was immediately put on hold. After 6 minutes, someone picked up and hung up on me. When I called back, I was put on hold again despite trying to explain the situation. I attempted to call multiple times, but my calls went unanswered. Unfortunately, it seems this pizza place is not interested in taking orders. Would not recommend.

recentReviews.author: Kyla S
recentReviews.text: 10/10 first experience!! We got the pleasure of having Jerry take care of us today. He was attentive, caring and was on top of EVERYTHING!! The FOOD WAS AMAZING!!! For our first time in here I can‚Äôt talk highly enough about it!!!! Will be making this place a go to from now on!! Thank you!!

recentReviews.author: Carondelet Kitchen
recentReviews.text: When a pizza place is so close and convenient you often forget to let others know how good it is!  We have been a patron since they opened and have NEVER had a bad experience!  Dine in, carry out or delivery, every time they pull through!  Perfect St. Louis style pizzas. Salads are also very good. Love their Zucchini sticks!  We are so spoiled and lucky to have this place in our neighborhood!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the attentive and caring service provided by the staff, particularly highlighting how waitstaff like Jerry ensure a memorable dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The food is consistently described as amazing, with specific mentions of perfect St. Louis style pizzas, salads, and zucchini sticks, making it a neighborhood favorite. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

Long-term customer loyalty is evident, with patrons returning for years and appreciating the convenience of dining options like dine-in, carry out, or delivery. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Poor dine-in experience and lack of staff attentiveness - social media marketing can improve this area
Difficulty placing orders over the phone - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews about service and ambiance - review management can address this concern

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
